Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by St. Louis in 1989...
Injured on 8/24/1989 with a Spasms Back, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 4/19/1991 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 8-9 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/27/1993...
Won World Series with St. Louis in 1993...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1994, winning 2 games with a 0.51 ERA...
